name: part_002
file: tmp_【#ブラちょこ】Black choco Christmas！5周年３DLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [YjTnRIIczcE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco and Yozora Mel performing 'Black Christmas'.
Yuzuki Choco, Yozora Mel, and Omaru Polka performing 'Happy Halloween'.

subtitles.original: ジングルベルより 甘いマスター
subtitles.english: A master sweeter than jingle bells

subtitles.original: 反り染めの指 君で踊ろう
subtitles.english: Let's dance with your dyed fingers

subtitles.original: 終わらない悪夢を クリスマス
subtitles.english: An endless nightmare, Christmas

subtitles.original: 傷つくだけの世界を
subtitles.english: A world that only hurts

subtitles.original: 探すのは黒いサンタクロース
subtitles.english: Seeking a black Santa Claus

subtitles.original: 泣き声をかき消して 鐘が鳴る
subtitles.english: Drowning out the cries, the bell rings

subtitles.original: まだ冷ややかな毒に乗せて
subtitles.english: Still riding on a chilly poison

subtitles.original: こびりついた愛も不安も
subtitles.english: Clinging love and anxiety too

subtitles.original: 何だって委ねてごらん
subtitles.english: Try entrusting everything

subtitles.original: 今宵はディンドン ディンドン 明かさず
subtitles.english: Tonight is Ding-Dong, Ding-Dong, without dawn

subtitles.original: 眠るハッピークリスマスへ
subtitles.english: To a sleeping Happy Christmas

subtitles.original:
Happy Halloween
作詞・作曲・編曲：Junky
subtitles.english:
Happy Halloween
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Junky

subtitles.original: ねえ もう暗くなりそうだから
subtitles.english: Hey, it's about to get dark

subtitles.original: 出ちゃってもいいかしら
subtitles.english: So maybe it's okay to go out?

subtitles.original: ちょっとね 魔法にかけられた
subtitles.english: A little bit, cast under a spell...

subtitles.original: 君のお菓子から食べちゃうぞ
subtitles.english: I'll start by eating your sweets!

subtitles.original: きっと もう霧が濃くなるから
subtitles.english: Surely, the fog will get thicker soon

subtitles.original: みんな集まるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if everyone will gather

subtitles.original: じっとして 甘いもの我慢した
subtitles.english: Staying still, I held back on sweets...

subtitles.original: ご褒美を ほら
subtitles.english: Look, here's the reward

subtitles.original: ひとつ ふたつ 鐘の音
subtitles.english: One, two, the sound of the bell

subtitles.original: 騒ぎ出した 小さいお化けたち
subtitles.english: The little ghosts have started a ruckus

subtitles.original: 今日は許してくれるのさ
subtitles.english: Today, they'll forgive us

subtitles.original: 街に行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go to the city

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's a Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: いたずらしちゃうぞ ding-dong-dang
subtitles.english: We're going to play tricks, ding-dong-dang

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちも trick or treat
subtitles.english: Here and there, trick or treat

subtitles.original: キャンディーはくれないの？
subtitles.english: Won't you give me some candy?

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's a Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: いたいけなランタンパンプキン
subtitles.english: Sweet little lantern pumpkins

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも踊るよ 朝まで
subtitles.english: Even tired Jack will dance until morning

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's a Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: お化けのカボチャもラララ
subtitles.english: The ghost pumpkins too, la-la-la

subtitles.original: 今日は街中 trick or treat
subtitles.english: Today, the whole town is trick or treat

subtitles.original: チョコも頂戴よ
subtitles.english: Give me some chocolate too

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's a Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: 不思議な世界へようこそ
subtitles.english: Welcome to a mysterious world

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも歌うよ let's trick or treat
subtitles.english: Even tired Jack will sing, let's trick or treat

subtitles.original: もっと もっと 欲しい
subtitles.english: I want more and more

subtitles.original: 欲張りなゴースト
subtitles.english: Greedy ghosts

subtitles.original: もうない？ それなら
subtitles.english: No more? In that case...

subtitles.original: いたずらの餌食ね
subtitles.english: You're a victim of our tricks

subtitles.original: くれない家なんて
subtitles.english: A house that won't give anything...

subtitles.original: 庭木にトイレットペーパー ぐるぐるしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Let's wrap toilet paper all around the garden trees

subtitles.original: 今夜はランタン灯してるなら
subtitles.english: If the lanterns are lit tonight...

subtitles.original: 甘いの頂戴 さあ let's party night
subtitles.english: Give us something sweet, now let's party night!

subtitles.original: ほら だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Look, because it's a Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: 時計も回る tick-tack
subtitles.english: The clock is turning, tick-tack

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちも trick or treat
subtitles.english: Here and there, trick or treat

subtitles.original: 目眩むパンプキンパイ
subtitles.english: Dazzling pumpkin pie

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's a Happy Halloween
